Query the Ensembl REST API

queryEnsembl.Rd

Query the Ensembl REST API

queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)

Arguments

path

Character: API path
query

Character: API query
grch37

Boolean: query the Ensembl GRCh37 API? if FALSE, query the most recent API

Value

Parsed response or NULL if no response

Examples

path  <- "overlap/region/human/7:140424943-140624564"
query <- list(feature = "gene")
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#>                                                                   description
#> 1 v-raf murine sarcoma viral oncogene homolog B [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:1097]
#> 2                               U6 spliceosomal RNA [Source:RFAM;Acc:RF00026]
#>   strand seq_region_name external_name feature_type assembly_name
#> 1     -1               7          BRAF         gene        GRCh37
#> 2      1               7            U6         gene        GRCh37
#>                id       end     start         source         gene_id
#> 1 ENSG00000157764 140624564 140419127 ensembl_havana ENSG00000157764
#> 2 ENSG00000271932 140583978 140583872        ensembl ENSG00000271932
#>          biotype            logic_name version
#> 1 protein_coding   ensembl_havana_gene       8
#> 2          snRNA ncrna_homo_sapiens_37       1

path  <- "lookup/symbol/human/BRCA2"
query <- list(expand=1)
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#> $description
#> [1] "breast cancer 2, early onset [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:1101]"
#> 
#> $source
#> [1] "ensembl_havana"
#> 
#> $assembly_name
#> [1] "GRCh37"
#> 
#> $object_type
#> [1] "Gene"
#> 
#> $strand
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $seq_region_name
#> [1] "13"
#> 
#> $version
#> [1] 10
#> 
#> $start
#> [1] 32889611
#>
